name: Closed Circuit (itch) (The4thAD)
description:
Closed Circuit
You are a mechanic tasked with repairing a building whose wires have been burned up due to a lightning strike.  Find a way to power all the lights and complete the circuit!

Controls:
WASD / Arrow keys to move
R: Restart level
B: Back (not undo)

Credits:
Project lead: The4thAD
Programming: The4thAD
Assets: The4thAD
Sound design: The4thAD
